dcterms:description: This dataset contains the PM2.5 data of US Embassy in Beijing with an hour sampling rate between January 1st, 2010 and December 31st, 2014. It includes meteorological data from Beijing Capital International Airport, such as current time, PM2.5 concentration, dew point, temperature, pressure, wind direction, wind speed, hours of snow, and hours of rain.
dcterms:title: Beijing PM2.5 Data

dcterms:creator: F. Zamora-Mart´ınez
P. Romeu
P. Botella-Rocamora
J. Pardo
dcterms:description: This dataset is collected from a monitor system mounted in a domotic house, used for indoor temperature prediction. It corresponds to approximately 40 days of monitoring data, sampled every minute and smoothed with 15 minute means.
dcterms:title: SML2010

dcterms:creator: Yong Du
Wei Wang
Liang Wang
dcterms:description: The MSR Action3D dataset contains twenty actions performed by ten subjects, each performing each action 2 or 3 times. It includes 567 depth map sequences recorded with a depth sensor, with a resolution of 320x240.
dcterms:title: MSR Action3D Dataset
